name: Consume (MoistAmerica)
description:
Consume is a simple Game Boy Color JRPG made with GB Studio.

You take the role of Scum, a criminal tasked with defeating the Demon Lord in order to gain their freedom. 

Defeat monsters to gain exp to level up and gold to spend. 

Use gold to buy potions, drugs, and a place to rest. 

There are multiple endings based on what actions you take and how much you explore.

--CONTROLS--
